item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Monday, April 14, 2025 at 6:25 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Show HN: Resurrecting Infocom's Unix Z-Machine with Cosmopolitan (41 points | 8 comments)
2. Show HN: Nissan's Leaf app doesn't have a home screen widget so I made my own (74 points | 36 comments)
3. Albert Einstein's Theory of Relativity in Words of Four Letters or Less (7 points | discuss)
4. Open guide to equity compensation (379 points | 163 comments)
5. PHP Core Security Audit Results (64 points | 16 comments)
6. Why-everything-in-the-universe-turns-more-complex (55 points | 26 comments)
7. Show HN: I made a free tool that analyzes SEC filings and posts detailed reports (121 points | 41 comments)
8. Everything wrong with MCP (152 points | 81 comments)
9. NoProp: Training neural networks without back-propagation or forward-propagation (76 points | 15 comments)
10. Neutrinos' maximum possible mass shrinks further (25 points | 5 comments)
11. Writing Cursor rules with a Cursor rule (77 points | 21 comments)
12. Transformer Lab (55 points | 1 comment)
13. New Vulnerability in GitHub Copilot, Cursor: Hackers Can Weaponize Code Agents (38 points | 5 comments)
14. Calypso: LLMs as Dungeon Masters' Assistants [pdf] (42 points | 14 comments)
15. Math 13 – An Introduction to Abstract Mathematics [pdf] (125 points | 8 comments)
16. Implementing DeepSeek R1's GRPO algorithm from scratch (103 points | discuss)
17. Quick Primer on MCP Using Ollama and LangChain (82 points | 13 comments)
18. Emily Dickinson's Playful Letterlocking (5 points | discuss)
19. Googler... ex-Googler (362 points | 138 comments)
20. Docker Model Runner (47 points | 12 comments)
21. Why Fennel? (215 points | 96 comments)
22. The dark side of the Moomins (273 points | 78 comments)
23. Wiz's $32B GTM Playbook: Unpacking the Formula (Part I) (22 points | discuss)
24. I bought a Mac (141 points | 78 comments)
25. Writing my own dithering algorithm in Racket (133 points | 30 comments)
26. Shadertoys Ported to Rust GPU (41 points | 2 comments)
27. How much oranger do red orange bags make oranges look? (106 points | 57 comments)
28. Exwm: Emacs X Window Manager (101 points | 27 comments)
29. Super Rat: the record-setting rodent sniffing out landmines and saving lives (14 points | 7 comments)
30. GeoDeep's AI Detection on Maxar's Satellite Imagery (40 points | 9 comments)
